rComments: I have had Christian for two classes, she's awesome. All y'all who had her for 20b are probably not film majors, that class is always hated, it is a boring pre-requisite class.

Horrible teacher and class. midterm was ridiculous as was the so called curve. Papers were a total joke. Suppose to be relatively easy and they graded harder than lit classes! Final was crazy 2. TAs r way to into it...power trip is right! Subject sounds appealing but AVOID!! Watch tv at home, it'll b way less stressful.

I really do not understand everyone who says Laura is a bad professor.  I have had her for two classes and now they have easily been the most interesting and clear classes I have taken in the film department.  Her tests are a little difficult, but if you go to lecture and copy her power points they are easy.  She is very approachable & helpful.

I took this class because it was 2 GE's, but it wasn't worth it. She is boring, and all of the class assignments were boring too. The first midterm was relatively easy, but the final was terrible. The reader and textbook were really bad too. We got to watch an hour of TV every lecture though. HORRIBLE CLASS OVERALL

Her stutter does get really annoying..midterm was really weird/hard.She made the multiple choice worth like 60%.The final (analytic screening,2 short essays,multiple choice-like the midterm)was easy-straight from the online lecture notes.Both writing assignments were really easy. I had a great TA (Heather) who graded easily and was really helpful.
all other comments are so true. they've already said everything I came here to say :/ just, don't take her...wait until you can have another professor hopefully.

Incredibly boring!!! Screenings of television shows are bearable if you can stay awake until they start usually during the last half of class. She tests directly off her slides. Course Reader and books were almost useless. She and my TA were on a power trip which was very unfair. TA was a ****! Only take this class if it is a different professor.

Horrible professor! Ratings below are TRUE for film 20B. Every other word out of her mouth was "um....uhh". Slides were EXTREMELY boring, waay too much information and were colorless and picture-less. Overall, AVOID taking this class with this professor! she was not about to give us a curve for the midterm which the points were horribly scaled!

She was a bad  professor for this class.My TA could have taught this class way better! She was always sounding like she was reading off wikipedia and she never really tried to engage the class at all. Every other word was "uh...um" and it was hard to understand.She seems very inexperienced and needs to not read off the computerI don't reccomend her

She was an awful teacher.  She was extremely unfair and every other word out of her mouth is either uh or um.  It was so hard to pay attention to her becuase of this (in one class 270 times).  Her tests were so hard.  There were 16 multiple choice questions (this is an analytical class) that were worth 4 points each = 64 points.

She went on a power trip this quarter.test were unfairly hard with the multiple choices worth way more then the essay questions.if you can endure the first hr of lecture then she'll put on a screening.the powerpoints were also ridiculously lengthy and  we never get enough time to copy it all.thought it a tv class was gonna be fun.i was wrong.AVOID

I think that Laura was a great teacher, although she was extremely self-conscious in her lectures. She chose great subjects to study on and we watched a film in every class which was awesome. I recommend both the class and the teacher.
